title: Talking About Abortion With My Mom
description:
It's easy to dismiss your pro life mom. But what if it feels like the very reason she is pro-life, is YOU. This week, a family feud that's more intimate and impossible than the usual. The Cut's Jazmín Aguilera sits down with journalist Kathleen Walsh ...and her mother.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Talking About Abortion With My Mom
itunes:author: Vox Media Podcast Network
itunes:subtitle: With a topic as polarizing as abortion, journalist Kathleen Walsh and her mom to figure out why this issue is more than just a political one.
